title: creating rank team - FOR FUN 5's and rewards / or LFT G1 sup
body:
Yo, looking to make rank team. dont really care about what the placement is.. as long as we win some games. pref players who are at least gold. no toxic players please. have access to skype but no biggie if you dont. 

running NZ time so active around 8pm to late...  

hit me up if youre keen. leave ign below and pref roles.

my ign: realskes - GOLD 1 - sup > fill

replies.body:
Hey,

I was looking to form/find a team as well. I'll give you a link to my thread, let me know if you're interested!!

Cheers,

Geoff

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/cx5hdZ8E-lft-casual-ranked-5s-for-fun-and-rewards

Hey gold 5 here willing to play any role though from best to worst i would say my roles would be top, ADC, jg, mid, sup. I'm normally rather relax in most games though like most i assume i get the occasional solo q match where someone been speaking nonsense and just cant help but get involved. Anyway IGN: Hashshashin feel free to add me and hopefully we can play together
Hey man, will be keen. Plat 5, mid/top. Add me
Hey man, we are looking for 1 player, i added you on League just accept and we'll get some 5s going.
